snippet: Mongolia's new government is in the process of passing a 2013 budget whose draft proposal includes increasing taxes and royalties on a huge copper mine by $300 million. If Rio Tinto seeks international arbitration to resolve the issue, it could delay...
abstract: Mongolia's new government is in the process of passing a 2013 budget whose draft proposal includes increasing taxes and royalties on a huge copper mine by $300 million. If Rio Tinto seeks international arbitration to resolve the issue, it could delay the start date for the mine.

headline.main: Tax Proposal in Mongolia Threatens Rio Tinto Project
headline.print_headline: Tax Proposal in Mongolia Threatens Rio Tinto Project
